Element.Title: How to remove a section from the main

PropertyValues.Value: It also happens that the company did not provide additional services. In this case, you can completely remove the section & quot; Service & quot; from the home page.

Element.Title: Showing services in the form of a slider

PropertyValues.Value: If the services are in addition to selling products, then maybe it makes sense to bring them as a slider. This is done in the settings of the information block.
